name: Moloka’i Frost
description: Moloka’i Frost (also known as Moloka’i Hashplant) is a potent sativa-dominant strain with a robust medicinal history. In 1969, residents of the Lalaaupapa Moloka’i leper colony were allowed to leave and access modern medicine. But a special medicine also left the Kalawao Valley (pronounced ka-la-wow), too. This flower grows like a sativa, but exhibits extremely powerful indica-like effects, including heavy sedation, strong analgesic effects, and latent euphoria that complements this strain’s heavy body elements. This rare resinous flower is a Hawaiian landrace worth seeking out.
descriptionPlain: Moloka’i Frost (also known as Moloka’i Hashplant) is a potent sativa-dominant strain with a robust medicinal history. In 1969, residents of the Lalaaupapa Moloka’i leper colony were allowed to leave and access modern medicine. But a special medicine also left the Kalawao Valley (pronounced ka-la-wow), too. This flower grows like a sativa, but exhibits extremely powerful indica-like effects, including heavy sedation, strong analgesic effects, and latent euphoria that complements this strain’s heavy body elements. This rare resinous flower is a Hawaiian landrace worth seeking out.
aka: Moloka’i Medicine,  Moloka’i Hashplant, Kalawao Kine

highlightedReviews.text: Ho Lee Shet. This strain prompted me to write my first review because it would be a dishonor to the islands of Hawaii for not promoting this incredible flower. After purchase i waited until the next morning to smoke it, i wanted to feel fresh. After breaking the seal, Moloka'i's raw nature-like odor climbed up inside my nostrils and started f**king. I let the scent do its thing until it was finished and then loaded up a gravity bong. A couple coughs later and i was best friends with couch. GREAT ODIN'S RAVEN was the come up satisfying! I wanted to sit down but also do everything i could think of all at once. Instead, I decided to build a much needed pineapple spice rack (you can find it on reddit). All in all, this is the perfect all-around strain to chill with friends, go to a sports game, bake muffins, or make sweet, sweet love to your woman.
This is my favorite cannabis! Tingly, happy, relaxed. Worth the price.
